name: COUNT
title: getcount.com
shortDescription: COUNT is a modern accounting software designed for high-volume accounting tasks. It serves accounting teams by automating manual work, allowing them to serve more clients and boost profits without increasing headcount. An example use case is a firm using COUNT to manage client documents, automate reconciliations, and communicate securely, all from a single platform.
pros: Secure client document storage and communication
Real-time data syncing and one-click migration
cons: May be complex for small businesses
Potentially high cost for full features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: QuickBooks
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Widely used with strong brand recognition

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: FreshBooks
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on small businesses and freelancers
